ai-kv17.7:0.4_0: He is worth nine simple near to the upper side.
ai-kv17.7:1.4_0: It’s not worthy of offerings dedicated to the gods, worthy of hospitality, worthy of a religious donation, worthy of greeting with joined palms, and is the supreme field of merit for the world.
ai-kv17.7:1.6_0: If the Sangha is worthy of offerings dedicated to the gods, worthy of hospitality, worthy of a religious donation, worthy of greeting with joined palms, and is the supreme field of merit for the world.
ai-kv17.7:2.4_0: Doesn’t the four pairs of persons?
ai-kv17.7:2.6_0: If a pair of men were struck by the Buddha, the four pairs of persons said:
ai-kv17.7:3.4_0: There is no gift that is bestowed on the Saṅgha, and giving them to the Community,
ai-kv17.7:3.6_0: If there were some offering, one who gives a gift to the Sangha, and after giving the meal, they imprisoned
ai-kv17.7:4.1_0: there are none of the Sangha,
ai-kv17.7:4.7_0: and giving him the drinking water, delighting in the south.
ai-kv17.7:4.9_0: trying to give him water for the Sangha, and after giving the meal, they precincts back
ai-kv17.7:5.1_0: The Sangha purifes the right way.
ai-kv17.7:5.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv17.7:5.5_0: Knowing this, the Saṅgha is not worthwhile.
